description: This six week course is designed for students worldwide who want to learn how to find, evaluate, and use information efficiently, effectively, and ethically for academic work. Go beyond the search engine to leverage what you already know about finding information to improve your search capability and apply bibliographic research concepts to your work. Learn how to evaluate and use library databases, digital repositories, the hidden Web, and government information.
title: Mastering Academic Research: Information Skills for Successful Students
